name: Youtube Clone
desc: A responsive clone of Youtube, built using React and Node.js, allowing video browsing and playback.

name: Yoga Pose Detection
desc: Detects and classifies yoga poses using CNN and Yolo.

name: Yoga with AI
desc: An AI-powered platform that guides users through yoga practices using real-time pose correction.

name: Potato Leaf Disease Prediction
desc: Utilizes machine learning to detect diseases in potato leaves from images, helping farmers identify issues early.

name: Data Analytics for PCOS
desc: Analyze symptom data in young women with PCOS to identify patterns and correlations that could enhance early diagnosis and intervention.
